com.ctrlaltelite.pos.gui

Class ManageMenuController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ctrlaltelite.pos.gui.ManageMenuController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class ManageMenuController
extends Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    A controller that manages the currently available menu items in the POS. Can be used to edit the price and status of a menu item, as well as manage the required ingredients to make a menu item.

      • getNumFromStringHead

        public int getNumFromStringHead(String s)
        Extracts and returns the leading numeric value from the beginning of the given string. It collects numeric characters until a non-numeric character is encountered.
        Parameters:
        s - the string from which to extract the leading number
        Returns:
        the extracted integer value from the start of the string
